main event: A civilian reported observing a cigar-shaped object that exploded, initially brilliant white and then vivid green, persisting for about 15 seconds before fading to white.
interesting points: The object was first sighted until it exploded,The object was about the size of a cigarette butt during observation,It was seen approximately 30 degrees above the horizon,The sighting lasted for 25-30 seconds,Another witness was noted to have also seen the same sighting, suggesting possible corroboration.
witness description: civilians, one a card dealer aged 62 from Las Vegas, Nevada
